ambassadors.title: Team Peps - Ambassadors

club.description: Founded in 2022 by Féfé with the main aim of supporting the French e-sport scene, the PEPS team was initially a project to highlight the often sidelined French Overwatch community. The project quickly met with great success, prompting Féfé to take the project to the international stage. Today, we want to give promising profiles the recognition they deserve, and show everyone the enthusiasm and solidarity of the French community, while putting in some great performances every season. give promising profiles the recognition they deserve, and show everyone the enthusiasm and solidarity of the French community, while putting in some great performances every season.
